Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDT1 |
| NDT3 |
| semiconductor materials |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDT1 |
| NDT3 |
| semiconductor materials |

Note: In the original paragraph, "NDT1" and "NDT3" are clearly identified as materials, and "semiconductor materials" can be inferred as a type of material based on the context.

These are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph. "NDT1 and NDT3" and "recently" do not clearly refer to material properties, but rather to specific materials and a time frame. "Figure 1" is a visual representation and not a material property.
